mapper.select: SELECT T1.WORDBOOK_SEQ /*단어장일련번호*/ , T1.WORDBOOK_NM /*단어장명*/ , T1.FST_REG_ID /*최초등록자아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.FST_REG_DTTI, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") FST_REG_DTTI /*최초등록일시*/ , T1.LT_UPD_ID /*최종수정자아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.LT_UPD_DTTI, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") LT_UPD_DTTI /*최종수정일시*/ FROM TB_WORDBOOK T1 /*테이블_단어장*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.USE_YN = #{useYn} ORDER BY T1.WORDBOOK_NM ASC

SELECT T1.WORDBOOK_SEQ /*단어장일련번호*/ , T1.WORD_ID /*단어식별자*/ , T1.WORD /*단어*/ , T1.MEAN /*뜻*/ , T1.BOOKMARK_YN /*중요단어여부*/ , T1.CHAL_CNT /*챌린지횟수*/ , T1.FST_REG_ID /*최초등록자아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.FST_REG_DTTI, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") FST_REG_DTTI /*최초등록일시*/ , T1.LT_UPD_ID /*최종수정자아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.LT_UPD_DTTI, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") LT_UPD_DTTI /*최종수정일시*/ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T1.WORD) - 1 AS RNUM FROM TB_WORD T1 /*테이블_단어*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq} ORDER BY RAND()
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('WORDBOOK_SEQ') FROM DUAL /*wordbookSeq 값을 map에 반환*/
INSERT INTO TB_WORDBOOK /*테이블_단어장*/ ( WORDBOOK_SEQ /*단어장일련번호*/ , WORDBOOK_NM /*단어장명*/ , FST_REG_ID /*최초등록자ID*/ , LT_UPD_ID /*최종수정자ID*/ ) VALUES ( #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/ , #{wordbookNm} /*단어장명*/ , #{loginInfo.userId} /*최초등록자ID*/ , #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ )

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(WORD_ID), 0) + 1 FROM TB_WORD WHERE WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq}
INSERT INTO TB_WORD /*테이블_단어*/ ( WORDBOOK_SEQ /*단어장일련번호*/ , WORD_ID /*단어식별자*/ , WORD /*단어*/ , MEAN /*뜻*/ , CHAL_CNT /*챌린지횟수*/ , FST_REG_ID /*최초등록자ID*/ , LT_UPD_ID /*최종수정자ID*/ ) VALUES ( #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/ , #{wordId} /*단어식별자*/ , #{word} /*단어*/ , #{mean} /*뜻*/ , 0 /*챌린지횟수*/ , #{loginInfo.userId} /*최초등록자ID*/ , #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WORDBOOK /*테이블_단어장*/ SET WORDBOOK_NM = #{wordbookNm} /*단어장명*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/

UPDATE TB_WORD /*테이블_단어장*/ SET WORD = #{word} /*단어*/ , MEAN = #{mean} /*뜻*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/ AND WORD_ID = #{wordId} /*단어식별자*/
UPDATE TB_WORDBOOK /*테이블_단어장*/ SET USE_YN = 'N' /*사용여부*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/

UPDATE TB_WORD /*테이블_단어장*/ SET BOOKMARK_YN = #{bookmarkYn} /*중요단어여부*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/ AND WORD_ID = #{wordId} /*단어식별자*/
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_WORD /*테이블_단어*/ WHERE WORDBOOK_SEQ = #{wordbookSeq} /*단어장일련번호*/ AND WORD_ID = #{wordId} /*단어식별자*/
